# Welcome {.unnumbered}

This is the website for the course: “Spatial Data Modelling for Population Science using R”. The course was designed and is delivered by Professor [Francisco Rowe](https://www.franciscorowe.com) from the Geographic Data Science Lab at the Department of Geography and Planning from the University of Liverpool, United Kingdom.

::: callout-note
A PDF version of this course is available for download [here](https://github.com/fcorowe/smds-pop/blob/main/docs/Spatial-Data-Modelling.pdf).
:::
